topics.body:
_*Alright daddy's home!*_

!http://25.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_lwb3yoV9jA1r4y7cjo1_500.gif!

People are upset, Friends are crying.


"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5372729b6368727e7d990300#post_5372729b6368727e7d990300
Don't be sad man, You're an awesome dude! I know that from talking to ya all the time.

you see sometimes the things you say might come off as douchey without you even trying too.

It's just that yes some people might not like the same things. and yes it's ok to offer them those things, but if they say "I'm not really interested" don't keep talking about it around them as it might frustrate them cuz they don't really want to talk about it.

Plus if they do show signs of interest and say things like "Well I have seen Envagelion before?" Don't say it's "Mainstream" Or "not that good" Cuz it starts to kinda look like you're bashin on their interests that's all.

And don't be so quick to call people an Asshole cuz it actually makes you look like an asshole and I know your not.

anyway I got to get to school in a couple of minutes, I hope you feel better dude and I hope my words are not sounding harsh, I'm not good with words.

Alrighty I'm Off and I hope everyone cheers up. 

And if not _*well,*_


!http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-CjBsAqYah7A/T5wQhpK--oI/AAAAAAAAAfU/JJRie0dqrhg/s1600/i'll+be+back.gif#i%27ll%20be%20back%20gif%20500x230!

Simple answer:  I don't hate you, I don't hate mecha, but don't have time to watch it.

There's a reason why my college only has a 5% graduation rate; the majority of people don't even make it past the first week.  By the end of the first week one of my two roommates will have dropped out and by the end of the month chances are the other one will have dropped out.  By the time people reach the final semester in their degrees the classes only have about 5 people in them each.

Wow, That's a lot (Also, How does it look? Judging by that intro?)

[/bq]
My portfolio class last for my last degree out of the 150 students that started out at the same time as me only 8 people made it to the last class and only 7 out of the 8 graduated.  This college is good, but they don't fuck around.  The college teaches everything from nuclear engineering, aerospace engineering, network security to me taking game design.  When a college teaches nuclear engineering and stuff like that you can't afford to screw around cause one lazy person graduating = big problem.

I already know which one of my roommates is going to quit.  The guy in the other room took six classes in a high stress field and is probably going to wind up getting burned out by the first week.  I've seen it a million times; people that just think they can come on in and get A's in everything then get burned out.





80's style anime that didn't take itself too seriously and as a result even though it seems cheesy seems enjoyable to watch anyhow.

Giant robo is styled after 60s anime, It may look just like typical cliched kids show, But you soon find out that there's a lot more to it than that, And Yeah, It's gloriously Cheesy the whole way through
